data.lyric:
[ti:SUGAR (Explicit)]
[ar:Brockhampton]
[al:GINGER (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]SUGAR (Explicit) - Brockhampton
[00:00.09]Lyrics by：Matthew Champion/Ciarán McDonald/Ryan Beatty/Dominique Simpson/Ian Simpson/Romil Hemnani/Jabari Manwarring/Chuks Chiejine
[00:00.18]Composed by：Matthew Champion/Ciarán McDonald/Ryan Beatty/Dominique Simpson/Ian Simpson/Romil Hemnani/Jabari Manwarring/Chuks Chiejine
[00:00.27]Ryan Beatty：
[00:00.58]Spendin' all my nights alone waiting for you to call me
[00:04.37]You're the only one I want by my side when I fall asleep
[00:08.24]Tell me what I'm waiting for tell me what I'm waiting for
[00:11.97]I know it's hard but we need each other
[00:14.21]Know it's hard but we need each other
[00:16.20]Dom McLennon：
[00:16.48]I move mountains on my own don't need nobody help
[00:20.01]Change your mind when I change my life better start believing in myself
[00:23.57]And we all out lookin' for lookin' for God so we never see it in ourself
[00:27.49]S**t divine intervention move in stealth
[00:29.59]It's hard to tell what the prayer compel
[00:31.42]You can find me dancing in between the raindrops
[00:33.85]Tryna find a way to make the pain stop
[00:36.22]Overtime on the graveyard
[00:38.01]Got a n***a feeling brainwashed
[00:39.74]My instability's trademark
[00:41.90]Copy written in all my decisions
[00:43.43]This is not supposed to be a way of living
[00:45.74]Tear my temple down into a prison s**t
[00:47.09]Ryan Beatty：
[00:47.19]Spendin' all my nights alone waiting for you to call me
[00:51.20]You're the only one I want by my side when I fall asleep
[00:55.08]Tell me what I'm waiting for tell me what I'm waiting for
[00:58.84]I know it's hard but we need each other
[01:00.92]Know it's hard but we need each other
[01:02.67]Matt Champion：
[01:03.00]Yeah back on Vincent with the braces on
[01:05.07]Used to slide out the back without the neighbors knowin'
[01:07.26]Pose for the picture with the pearly whites
[01:08.94]Dead lens zoomin' in catching all my strikes
[01:11.11]Used to trade a joint for some molly
[01:12.52]And she gave me all I need for the night 40 suffice
[01:15.11]Morally alright but I need some advice
[01:16.78]And I know that I'm acting foolish
[01:19.01]Could you pick me up around noon-ish
[01:20.93]Half a blunt yeah we coolin'
[01:22.89]Twist it up putting on outKast
[01:24.38]I'm the taxi and yeah we cruisin'
[01:25.95]Bearface：
[01:26.20]But when I love you right I love you right
[01:30.65]I'm by your side
[01:33.14]But I'll make it bright baby I want you to know
[01:38.06]I'ma be there for you I'ma make you see that
[01:42.27]I want you I want you
[01:49.38]Ryan Beatty：
[01:49.71]Spendin' all my nights alone waiting for you to call me
[01:53.60]You're the only one I want by my side when I fall asleep
[01:57.50]Tell me what I'm waiting for tell me what I'm waiting for
[02:01.37]I know it's hard but we need each other
[02:03.43]Know it's hard but we need each other
[02:05.52]Kevin Abstract：
[02:05.81]Back and forth
[02:08.05]I'll take that if that's all you asking for
[02:12.21]With my legs up on the dashboard
[02:15.83]Only thing in my pocket is my passport pa-passport
[02:21.49]Back and forth
[02:23.67]I'll take that if that's all you asking for
[02:27.83]With my legs up on the dashboard
[02:31.44]Only thing in my pocket is my passport pa-passport
[02:37.09]Back and forth
[02:39.30]I'll take that if that's all you asking for
[02:43.38]With my legs up on the dashboard
[02:47.03]Only thing in my pocket is my passport pa-passport
[02:51.33]Bearface：
[02:51.89]So do you love me love me love me
[02:56.06]Do you love me love me love me
[02:59.95]Do you love me love me love me
[03:03.89]Do you love me love me
[03:06.00]Oh
[03:07.75]Do you love me love me love me
[03:11.65]Do you love me love me love me
[03:15.62]Do you love me love me love me
[03:19.49]Do you love me love me
[03:21.61]Oh
data.trans:
[ti:SUGAR (Explicit)]
[ar:Brockhampton]
[al:GINGER (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.09]//
[00:00.18]//
[00:00.27]//
[00:00.58]独自度过漫漫长夜 一直在等你的电话
[00:04.37]当我酣然入睡时 你是我唯一想同枕共眠的人
[00:08.24]告诉我 我在等什么
[00:11.97]我知道前途未卜 可我们需要彼此
[00:14.21]我知道前途未卜 可我们需要彼此
[00:16.20]//
[00:16.48]我竭尽全力自力更生 不需要任何人的帮助
[00:20.01]当我改变人生时 请你改变心意 最好开始相信自己
[00:23.57]我们都在寻寻觅觅 上帝 我们我们从未在自己身上见到过
[00:27.49]天意在暗中作祟
[00:29.59]很难说出祈祷有何魔力
[00:31.42]你可以看见我在雨中翩翩起舞
[00:33.85]试图找到方法摆脱痛苦的折磨
[00:36.22]筋疲力尽 只有死亡才能解脱
[00:38.01]让我有种被洗脑的感觉
[00:39.74]我还未站稳脚跟
[00:41.90]我所有的决定跃然纸上
[00:43.43]这不应该成为一种生活方式
[00:45.74]信仰崩塌 让自己成为囚徒
[00:47.09]//
[00:47.19]独自度过漫漫长夜 一直在等你的电话
[00:51.20]当我酣然入睡时 你是我唯一想同枕共眠的人
[00:55.08]告诉我 我在等什么
[00:58.84]我知道前途未卜 可我们需要彼此
[01:00.92]我知道前途未卜 可我们需要彼此
[01:02.67]//
[01:03.00]出人头地 回到Vincent
[01:05.07]你从后门偷偷溜走 邻居们都未察觉到
[01:07.26]凹个造型 拍张照片 露出洁白透亮的牙齿
[01:08.94]死亡步步紧逼 抓住所有机会
[01:11.11]曾经以物易物 换点上等货
[01:12.52]她给了我今晚所需要的一切 心满意足
[01:15.11]道德上毫无差池 可我需要一些建议
[01:16.78]我知道我的行径很愚蠢
[01:19.01]你能在临近中午时来接我吗
[01:20.93]一星半点的快乐 我们可以尽情享乐
[01:22.89]扭动起来吧 放着OutKast的歌
[01:24.38]我仿佛是出租车 我们肆意兜风
[01:25.95]//
[01:26.20]当我全心全意地爱你
[01:30.65]我就在你身边
[01:33.14]可我会让前途一片光明 宝贝 我想让你知道
[01:38.06]我会与你厮守终生 我一定会做到的
[01:42.27]我渴望着你
[01:49.38]//
[01:49.71]独自度过漫漫长夜 一直在等你的电话
[01:53.60]当我酣然入睡时 你是我唯一想同枕共眠的人
[01:57.50]告诉我 我在等什么
[02:01.37]我知道前途未卜 可我们需要彼此
[02:03.43]我知道前途未卜 可我们需要彼此
[02:05.52]//
[02:05.81]来来回回
[02:08.05]如果这是你想要的 我欣然接受
[02:12.21]我的双腿放在仪表盘上
[02:15.83]我的包里只装着我的护照
[02:21.49]来来回回
[02:23.67]如果这是你想要的 我欣然接受
[02:27.83]我的双腿放在仪表盘上
[02:31.44]我的包里只装着我的护照
[02:37.09]来来回回
[02:39.30]如果这是你想要的 我欣然接受
[02:43.38]我的双腿放在仪表盘上
[02:47.03]我的包里只装着我的护照
[02:51.33]//
[02:51.89]你是否爱我
[02:56.06]你是否爱我
[02:59.95]你是否爱我
[03:03.89]你是否爱我
[03:06.00]//
[03:07.75]你是否爱我
[03:11.65]你是否爱我
[03:15.62]你是否爱我
[03:19.49]你是否爱我
[03:21.61]//
